com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics

Class ModernRoboticsI2cIrSeekerSensorV3

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.I2cDeviceSynchDevice<I2cDeviceSynch>
      • com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics.ModernRoboticsI2cIrSeekerSensorV3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HardwareDevice, I2cAddrConfig, I2cAddressableDevice, IrSeekerSensor, RobotArmingStateNotifier.Callback

    public class ModernRoboticsI2cIrSeekerSensorV3
extends I2cDeviceSynchDevice<I2cDeviceSynch>
implements IrSeekerSensor, I2cAddrConfig
    ModernRoboticsI2cIrSeekerSensorV3 supports the Modern Robotics IR Seeker V3.
    See Also:
    MR IR Seeker V3

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle()
        Description copied from interface: IrSeekerSensor
        Estimated angle in which the signal is coming from

        If the signal is estimated to be directly ahead, 0 will be returned. If the signal is to the left a negative angle will be returned. If the signal is to the right a positive angle will be returned. If no signal is detected, a 0 will be returned.

        NOTE: not all sensors give an accurate angle.

        Specified by:
        getAngle in interface IrSeekerSensor
        Returns:
        angle to IR signal

      • getStrength

        public double getStrength()
        Description copied from interface: IrSeekerSensor
        IR Signal strength

        Detected IR signal strength, on a scale of 0.0 to 1.0, where 0 is no signal detected and 1 is max IR signal detected.

        Specified by:
        getStrength in interface IrSeekerSensor
        Returns:
        signal strength, scaled from 0 to 1

      • getIndividualSensors

        public IrSeekerSensor.IrSeekerIndividualSensor[] getIndividualSensors()
        Description copied from interface: IrSeekerSensor
        Get a list of all IR sensors attached to this seeker. The list will include the angle at which the sensor is mounted, and the signal strength.
        Specified by:
        getIndividualSensors in interface IrSeekerSensor
        Returns:
        array of IrSensors
